title: What time does season 8 start?
body: What time in the morning? EST? PST?

replies.body:
Pretty sure the season start times are all midnight local time last I heard!

EDIT: local *server* time
:/ local time differs by 6 hrs in NA depending on where you are.
Yea that's supposed to be local *server* time, which is pretty much always the case when it comes to regions that span multiple time zones ^_^
If you're serious I would start next week. Let all the " just for fun" people get{{summoner:21}}  placed bronze 5 and have a better shot with the serious ones
Servers are in Chicago so probably 12:00 CST {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i hope its 12am est... i wish i knew
Local time is PST in NA. I think at 12am pst you can start feeding for the year :p
